title-group.article-title: Technology Integration into Preservice Foreign Language Teacher Education Programs

abstract.p: Using national technology goals and standards, and institutional factors as a framework, this article describes the planning process and the initial phases of the implementation of a model of technology integration into the foreign language preservice teacher education program for K-12 teachers. It also provides suggestions for instructional goals and subject-related content areas for a curricular component on technology for foreign language teachers.
